title: Welcome!
content:
## Thank you for using __UTM Timetable Generator V2__! ðŸ‘‹
If you are new here, you may view the tutorial/guide by clicking the '?' button on the top right corner.
I personally don't know any way to obtain the timetable for every school in UTM from any online sources. If you do, please provide your suggestion to [Feedback Form](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfXOIkb-wu3sXxMd662vuNdGp-Gs4w08suZPKgw7BeIChrmUQ/viewform?usp=sf_link). Your help is greatly appreciated!

__Semester 1, 2021/2022__: Covered schools: 1. __School of Chemical and Energy Engineering__ 2. __School of Computing__
